title: First And Last Position Of An Element In Sorted Array
statement: You Have Been Given A Sorted Array/List ARR Consisting Of ‘N’ Elements. You Are Also Given An Integer ‘K’. Now, Your Task Is To Find The First And Last Occurrence Of ‘K’ In ARR.
notes: If ‘K’ Is Not Present In The Array, Then The First And The Last Occurrence Will Be -1.
ARR May Contain Duplicate Elements.

example: For Example, If ARR = [0, 1, 1, 5] And K = 1, Then The First And Last Occurrence Of 1 Will Be 1(0 - Indexed) And 2.
